product_name: Club Ride Freedom Bike Shorts - Women's
long_description: Meeting a friend Saturday morning at the French bakery? Pull on the women's Club Ride Freedom Bike Shorts, hop on your bike and ride there to burn off some calories before downing those croissants. Lightweight, breathable stretch denim wicks moisture and dries quickly so you stay comfy on hot days. Seamless crotch gusset adds comfort in the saddle and frees up your leg movements. Five-pocket styling, plus a zippered side storage pocket. Club Ride Freedom Bike Shorts feature reflective accents for visibility in low light.
short_description: Meeting a friend Saturday morning at the French bakery? Pull on the women's Club Ride Freedom Bike Shorts, hop on your bike and ride there to burn off some calories before downing those croissants.
